00038 $inst_dir = dirname(__FILE__). "/../../../";
00039 require_once('simpletest/unit_tester.php');
00040 require_once('simpletest/reporter.php');
00041 require_once($inst_dir. '/include/packetfilter.inc.php');

00043 class FilterTest extends UnitTestCase {
00044   function FilterTest() {
00045     $this->UnitTestCase();
00046   }
00047 
00048   //
00049   // Basic parsing of rules
00050   //
00051   function test_basic_parsing() {
00052     $pfw = new pfw();
00053     $pfw->parseRulebase('pass in from any to any');
00054     $this->assertEqual(trim($pfw->generate(false, false)), 'pass in from any to any');
00055 
00056     $pfw = new pfw();
00057     $pfw->parseRulebase('block in from any to any');
00058     $this->assertEqual(trim($pfw->generate(false, false)),'block in from any to any');
00059 
00060     $pfw = new pfw();
00061     $pfw->parseRulebase('antispoof for lo0');
00062     $this->assertEqual(trim($pfw->generate(false, false)),'antispoof for lo0');
00063   }
00064 
00065   //
00066   // Test different features
00067   //
00068   function test_log() {
00069     $pfw = new pfw();
00070     $pfw->parseRulebase('pass log all');
00071     $this->assertEqual(trim($pfw->generate(false, false)),'pass log all');
00072 
00073     $pfw = new pfw();
00074     $pfw->parseRulebase('pass log-all all');
00075     $this->assertEqual(trim($pfw->generate(false, false)),'pass log-all all');
00076   }
00077   
00078   function test_returns() {
00079     $pfw = new pfw();
00080     $pfw->parseRulebase('pass return all');
00081     $this->assertEqual(trim($pfw->generate(false, false)),'pass return all');
00082 
00083     $pfw = new pfw();
00084     $pfw->parseRulebase('pass return-rst all');
00085     $this->assertEqual(trim($pfw->generate(false, false)),'pass return-rst all');
00086 
00087     $pfw = new pfw();
00088     $pfw->parseRulebase('pass return-icmp all');
00089     $this->assertEqual(trim($pfw->generate(false, false)),'pass return-icmp all');
00090 
00091     $pfw = new pfw();
00092     $pfw->parseRulebase('pass return-icmp6 all');
00093     $this->assertEqual(trim($pfw->generate(false, false)),'pass return-icmp6 all');
00094   }
00095 
00096   function test_directions() {
00097     $pfw = new pfw();
00098     $pfw->parseRulebase('pass in all');
00099     $this->assertEqual(trim($pfw->generate(false, false)),'pass in all');
00100 
00101     $pfw = new pfw();
00102     $pfw->parseRulebase('pass out all');
00103     $this->assertEqual(trim($pfw->generate(false, false)),'pass out all');
00104 
00105     $pfw = new pfw();
00106     $pfw->parseRulebase('pass all');
00107     $this->assertEqual(trim($pfw->generate(false, false)),'pass all');
00108   }
00109 
00110   function test_states() {
00111     $pfw = new pfw();
00112     $pfw->parseRulebase('pass out all keep state');
00113     $this->assertEqual(trim($pfw->generate(false, false)),'pass out all keep state');
00114 
00115     $pfw = new pfw();
00116     $pfw->parseRulebase('pass out all synproxy state');
00117     $this->assertEqual(trim($pfw->generate(false, false)),'pass out all synproxy state');
00118 
00119     $pfw = new pfw();
00120     $pfw->parseRulebase('pass out all modulate state');
00121     $this->assertEqual(trim($pfw->generate(false, false)),'pass out all modulate state');
00122   }
00123 
00124   function test_mulitples() {
00125     $pfw = new pfw();
00126     $pfw->parseRulebase('pass in on {$extif $intif} all');
00127     $this->assertEqual(trim($pfw->generate(false, false)),'pass in on { $extif $intif } all');
00128 
00129     $pfw = new pfw();
00130     $pfw->parseRulebase('pass in proto {tcp udp} all');
00131     $this->assertEqual(trim($pfw->generate(false, false)),'pass in proto { tcp udp } all');
00132 
00133     $pfw = new pfw();
00134     $pfw->parseRulebase('pass in from {1.2.3.4 2.3.4.5} to {1.2.3.4 2.3.4.5}');
00135     $this->assertEqual(trim($pfw->generate(false, false)),'pass in from { 1.2.3.4 2.3.4.5 } to { 1.2.3.4 2.3.4.5 }');
00136 
00137     $pfw = new pfw();
00138     $pfw->parseRulebase('pass in from any port {22 23} to any port {22 23}');
00139     $this->assertEqual(trim($pfw->generate(false, false)),'pass in from any port { 22 23 } to any port { 22 23 }');
00140   }

00210 
00211     $pfw = new pfw();
00212     $pfw->parseRulebase('block in from any os "nmap" to any');
00213     $this->assertEqual(trim($pfw->generate(false, false)),'block in from any os "nmap" to any');
00214 
00215     $pfw = new pfw();
00216     $pfw->parseRulebase('block in from any os { "nmap", "Windows 95" } to any');
00217     $this->assertEqual(trim($pfw->generate(false, false)),'block in from any os { "nmap" "Windows 95" } to any');
00218 
00219     $pfw = new pfw();
00220     $pfw->parseRulebase('pass in \
00221      all');
00222     $this->assertEqual(trim($pfw->generate(false, false)),'pass in all');
00223 
00224     $pfw = new pfw();
00225     $pfw->parseRulebase('pass in route-to ($inf1 $gw1) all');
00226     $this->assertEqual(trim($pfw->generate(false, false)),'pass in route-to { ($inf1 $gw1) } all');
00227 
00228     $pfw = new pfw();
00229     $pfw->parseRulebase('pass in route-to { ($inf1 $gw1), ($inf2, $gw2) } all');
00230     $this->assertEqual(trim($pfw->generate(false, false)),'pass in route-to { ($inf1 $gw1) ($inf2 $gw2) } all');
